Name: The Nottingham Corpus of Early Modern German Midwifery and Women's Medicine (ca. 1500-1700)
Description: This corpus contains medical writing from 1500 to 1700. The texts are taken primarily from digital facsimile copies available online via the University of Würzburg’s library interface, particularly from the subcategory of pertaining to gynaecology. The corpus is available for download from the Oxford Text Archive.
